story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful land of Ethiopia, there lived a young girl named Sara. Sara was known far and wide for her kindness and bravery. She had a heart as big as the vast Ethiopian highlands and a spirit as strong as the ancient mountains.

Every night, before she went to bed, Sara would gaze up at the twinkling stars in the night sky and make a wish. She wished for peace and harmony to reign over the land, for people to help one another, and for love to fill every heart.

One night, as Sara closed her eyes to sleep, a magical butterfly appeared before her. The butterfly fluttered its delicate wings, casting a soft glow around the room. It spoke with a gentle voice, saying, "Sara, you have a special gift within you, a gift of bringing happiness and light to those around you. Your kindness and courage have touched the hearts of many."

Sara listened in awe as the butterfly continued, "But remember, true magic lies in the power of love and kindness. No act of goodness is ever too small. By spreading joy and positivity, you can make a difference in the world."

Filled with wonder and gratitude, Sara promised to always follow her heart and spread love wherever she went. And from that night on, her dreams were filled with visions of a brighter and more harmonious world.

And so, dear child, remember the tale of Sara, the girl whose kindness and courage illuminated the world around her. As you drift off to sleep, may you be inspired to follow your own dreams and make the world a better place with your love and kindness.

Goodnight, sweet child, and may your dreams be filled with love and magic. Sleep tight, for a new day awaits with endless possibilities.
